word:
MR No. 516 - Inspiration

     The Lord did not move upon you by His Holy Spirit to write upon inspiration. That was not your work. While you may regard it as light, it will lead many souls astray, and will be a savor of death to some.--Letter 21, 1888, p. 4. (To Brother Butler, October 14, 1888.) 

Released January 18, 1977.
